
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/lsjwq/p/18700983" title="发布于 2025-02-06 14:11">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">DeepSeek+AnythingLLM打造自己大模型知识库</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                    <div id="cnblogs_post_description" style="display: none">
        
        有些用户或是专家在项目建设中提出来要提炼工艺库、模型库、算法库等知识库，可以试着让deepseek成为每个角色的助手，例如工艺的、信息化的、设备的、电气的等角色，让deepseek成为自己，再不断的迭代它。deepseek扮演AI助手的角色，应用越来越发挥出来应有的价值。
    </div>
<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p class="a0" style="text-align: center">&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 18px">DeepSeek+AnythingLLM打造自己大模型知识库</span></p>
<p class="a0"><span style="font-size: 16px">目&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 录</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 安装Ollama</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 下载DeepSeek模型</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 安装AnythingLLM</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 基本应用</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 自定义知识库应用</span></p>
<hr>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h1>1.&nbsp;&nbsp; 安装Ollama</h1>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　官方网站下载:https://ollama.com/，点击download进行下载。</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206135547048-1896820122.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 为了避免安装在C盘占用空间，可以使用命令指定路径方式安装Ollama，安装命令：<strong>OllamaSetup.exe /DIR=d:\Ollama</strong>，如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206135724456-867413733.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p>&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 直接安装就可以了，如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206135739564-374547792.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p>&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 配置下载模型保存路径，在电脑的环境变量中增加：OLLAMA_MODELS，设置保存模型路径：D:\Ollama\models。如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206135754349-2089444800.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<h1>2.&nbsp;&nbsp; 下载DeepSeek模型</h1>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　建议使用“Windows PowerShell”终端，使用“命令提示符”运行Ollama命令可能会出现参数错误的提示。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　DeepSeek-r1模型：1.5b约占用空间1.1GB，7b模型是4.7GB，8b模型是4.9GB，14b模型是9.0GB，32b是20GB，70b是43GB，671b是404GB，根据自己磁盘空间进行选择，原则上数据越大，回答的问题就越全面。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　我们选择下载8b模型，在Windows PowerShell终端运行命令：ollama run deepseek-r1:8b。如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206135828759-984852151.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 下载模型成功后，8b模型保存在D:\Ollama\models目录中。如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206135848547-1874417423.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 使用命令运行模型：ollama run deepseek-r1:8b。试一下提问：你是谁？使用效果如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206135908031-316389800.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p>&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 这样就算安装成功了。</span></p>
<h1>3.&nbsp;&nbsp; 安装AnythingLLM</h1>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　安装一个交互界面的软件，可以把资料投喂给大模型，类似的交互界面很多，暂时使用AnythingLLM，有其他好用的工具，网友留言反馈。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　官方网站：https://anythingllm.com，下载软件，如图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206135940190-1390335201.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p>&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 同样默认安装到D盘，如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206135958198-80241813.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　点击安装后，直接等待安装完成。根据网速情况，安装快慢不一样，会下载各种模型及相关文件。如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206140016409-1360600973.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 有可能all-minilm-l6-v2模型下载失败，这是一个语义转换模型，如果缺失，使用AnythingLLM上传文档内容会失败。下载all-minilm-l6-v2模型，github下载地址: <a href="https://github.com/user-attachments/files/18676036/Xenova.zip" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/user-attachments/files/18676036/Xenova.zip</a>。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 下载Xenova压缩包，解压到本机目录：C:\Users\WXZZ\AppData\Roaming\anythingllm-desktop\storage\models。如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206140041443-31614577.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<h1>4.&nbsp;&nbsp; 基本应用</h1>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　在桌面打开“AnythingLLM”应用程序，设置成中文，如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206140133678-859799380.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206140147902-306859954.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p>　　<span style="font-size: 16px">新建一个工作区，单击“新工作区”，在demo工作区上单击设置图标，在“聊天设置”设置“工作区聊天模型”为：deepseek-r1:8b。如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206140210445-151652861.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 在demo聊天应用效果如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206140222181-1104475107.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<h1>5.&nbsp;&nbsp; 自定义知识库应用</h1>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　在保持原有模型不变的情况下，提问：<strong>请规划一下稀土领域的生产管控系统的内容</strong>。deepseek回答的内容明显比较吃力，如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206140250042-1492393241.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　有些用户或是专家在项目建设中提出来要提炼工艺库、模型库、算法库等知识库，可以试着让deepseek成为每个角色的助手，例如工艺的、信息化的、设备的、电气的等角色，让deepseek成为自己，再不断的迭代它。deepseek扮演AI助手的角色，应用越来越发挥出来应有的价值</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">　　将自己的资料投喂给deepseek模型，在demo工作区上单击上传文件按钮，如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206140311325-1383772568.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p>&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 我把“<strong>稀土领域生产一体化管控系统案例.docx（基于iNeuOS工业互联网平台）</strong>”是上传投喂给deepseek模型，上传成功后，选择相应的文件，单击“Move to Workspace”按钮移动到demo工作区；然后单击“Save and Embed”按钮，这个过程会调用all-minilm-l6-v2模型，根据文档内容的大小处理过程耗时不一样；保存成功后，在文件后面的按钮钉起来后会变成黑色，就证明选择这个文件。如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206140325052-154119243.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p>&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 返回demo工作区后，问同样的问题：<strong>请规划一下稀土领域的生产管控系统的内容。</strong>如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206140435809-1105655101.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 显然deepseek模型参考了“<strong>稀土领域生产一体化管控系统案例.docx</strong>”文件的内容，因为内容很多就不具体展示了。总体来讲，效果还算可能。文档的内容如下图：</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/279374/202502/279374-20250206140453595-1132057752.png" alt="" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<hr>
